IDR 9,500,000,000.00
2019 Ferrari GTC4Lusso T

PRICE : Rp 9,5 M ON THE ROAD JAKARTA

KM 2,000 an
Full Option
Special Personalization Program Design

ENGINE SPECS – 3.9 V8 7AT (610 HP)
Cylinders V8
Displacement 3855 cm3
Power
448.7 KW @ 7500 RPM
610 HP @ 7500 RPM
602 BHP @ 7500 RPM

Torque 561 lb-ft @ 3000-5250 RPM
760 Nm @ 3000-5250 RPM
Fuel System Turbocharged Direct Injection
Fuel Gasoline

PERFORMANCE SPECS
Top Speed 320 km/h
Acceleration (0-100 kph) 3.5 s

TRANSMISSION SPECS
Drive Type Rear Wheel Drive
Gearbox 7-speed automatic

BRAKES SPECS
Front Ventilated Discs
Rear Discs

DIMENSIONS
Length 193.8 in (4923 mm)
Width 78 in (1981 mm)
Height 54.5 in (1384 mm)
Wheelbase 117.7 in (2990 mm)
Cargo Volume 15.9 cuFT (450 L)

WEIGHT SPECS
Unladen Weight (1760 kg)

PERSONALIZATION SPECIFICATIONS

CONFIGURATION
EXTERIOR : EXTRA-RANGE
INTERIOR : EXTRA-RANGE
MATS : GRIGIO SCURO 751B

OPTIONS :

AFS2
ADAPTIVE HEADUGHTS WITH SBL FUNCTION
CALY
YELLOW BRAKE CALLIPERS
CEXG
FRONT AIR VENTS IN CARBON FIBRE
CGI
FRONT GRILLE WITH CHROMED EDGES
ClAD

CIDH

COL

CIHZ
CARRON FINISH FOR UPPER AREA
CLR

CSBI

DATR

DUAL

ECRF
PANORAMIC ROOF
ELEV

EMPH
CAVALLINO STITCHED ON HEADREST
BLU
TORTORA 130426
THREAD IN GIALLO 0113
EXA3
SPORT EXHAUST SYSTEM
FLAG
ITALIAN FLAG
HELE
HIGH EMOTION LOW EMISSION
INMT
METRIC SYSTEM INSTRUMENTS
LOGO
‘SCUDERIA FERRARI’ SHIELDS
PAC2
DUAL VIEW FRONT PARKING CAMERA
PDIS
PASSENGER DISPLAY
RIFS
20° FORGED DARK PAINTED RIMS
RPMY
YELLOW REV. COUNTER
RSPA
SPOILER ON PANORAMIC ROOF IN NERO DS
RWWO REAR WIPER

SPEC
SPECIAL EQUIPMENT
STC2
COLORED SPECIAL STITCHING O.R.
STW1

SPECIAL EQUIPMENT
GIALLO 0113
EXTRA-RANGE
TRI-COAT YELLOW CAR PAINT.
UPHOLSTERY IN AZZURRO SANTORINI NON -WATER RESISTANT LEATHER.
